item.title: 【Singles (lossy)】MP3 - Butterfly (Havoc Mix) by Kylie Minogue
item.description:
I had both CD singles of Butterfly from Kylie. In fact, I posted one here for all to enjoy. I forgot to post the second one before I sold it. I had an issue with my iPod and I lost a few tracks from a couple of artists... Kylie included. I am hoping that someone who has the 9-tracke edition of Butterfly on CD can rip that ONE track "Butterfly" (Havoc Mix... aka Havoc's Deep Inside the Cocoon Mix) at 320 kbps, MP3... I'd greatly appreciate it. Thank you kindly!
Greg
item.author: midnightlounge
